post.title: free blackberry storm with unlimited telus data plan
post.content: i'll give away my storm with my telus plan. 24 months left. trying to get rid of it asap hence the offer. plan is below. i live near vancouver, bc. 150 minutes 150 bonus minutes billing per second evening/weekends free nationwide calling between telus-telus free caller id voicemail 10 unlimited text messaging unlimited data (email, browsing, streaming...everything. yes, i got one of those unlimited data plans) the plan is $45 before tax and system access fee. with everything in comes to below $60 a month you can remove the $25 unlimited data and it would be less than $30. pm if you are interested. ben
